body.name: Crayola Back To School Supplies Set (80ct), Crayons, Markers & Colored Pencils, Teacher Supplies, Kindergarten & Elementary School [Amazon Exclusive]
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 58 mins
features: CRAYOLA KIDS ART SUPPLY SET: Get ready for a creative school year with this all-in-one Crayola Back to School Set for kids, providing 80 pieces of fun!
ULTRA CLEAN WASHABLE MARKERS: Each set comes with 10 Ultra Clean Washable Broad Line and 10 Ultra Clean Washable Fine Line Markers that wash off skin and most fabrics with ease.
VIBRANT CRAYOLA CRAYONS: Make the classroom more colorful with 2 packs of 24 vibrant, high quality Crayola Crayons.
PRE-SHARPENED COLORED PENCILS: Say hello to creativity with 12 pre-sharpened Crayola Colored Pencils for drawing, mixing, blending, and more detailed art techniques.
INSPIRES CREATIVITY: The multitude of mediums will inspire self-expression and imagination, and keep the creative juices flowing at home or in the classroom!
BACK-TO-SCHOOL ESSENTIAL: Check off your back-to-school supply list with this Amazon exclusive Crayola Set, ensuring little artists are prepared for the year ahead.
SAFE AND NONTOXIC: Crayola Art Supplies are nontoxic for kids ages 3+.
body.description: Unleash creativity with the Crayola Back To School Supplies Set, an 80-piece Amazon exclusive that inspires artistic adventures for curious K-2 learners. This set combines crayons, markers, and colored pencils to form a dream team of creative tools. Be wowed by 10 Ultra Clean Broad Line & Fine Line Washable Markers that leave vibrant marks while easily washing off skin and most fabrics. Compliment art projects with the 2 packs of 24 Crayola Crayons that add additional textures and shades with a smooth laydown. To finish off, master the art of blending and intricate detail with 12 pre-sharpened Crayola Colored Pencils - great for practicing complex art techniques. This exciting collection champions a colorful spirit in the classroom and at home, as kids can stretch the limits of their creativity. It's a back-to-school essential that ticks all artistic boxes, ensuring young learners are geared up for a successful school year. All Crayola art supplies are safe and nontoxic, suitable for kids ages 3 and up.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At a Glance: Back to school set includes crayons, colored pencils, and washable markers Crayons are Nontoxic Colored pencils offer more detail and let kids practice advanced coloring techniques Ultra-Clean markers wash easily off skin, clothes, and other surfaces Great for facilitating creative, artistic play at home or in school Crayola Core Pack for Back to School - Grades K-2 Featuring Crayola Crayons, Colored Pencils, and Ultra-Clean Broad Line and Fine Line Washable Markers, this comprehensive art set allows kids to explore themselves artistically in a variety of mediums. Designed for children in kindergarten through 2nd grade, the Crayola Core Pack for Back to School - Grades K-2 ensures your kids are properly equipped for any drawing or coloring project in school or at home. What’s in the Box: Crayola Crayons, 24 Count, Pack of 2 Crayola Colored Pencils, 12 Count Crayola Ultra-Clean Broad Line Washable Markers, 10 Count Crayola Ultra-Clean Fine Line Washable Markers, 10 Count

Durable, Long-Lasting Crayons in 24 Bright Colors Great for a wide variety of coloring activities, Crayola Crayons are easy to use and leave bright, vivid lines on the page. Whether filling in coloring books or just exploring simple lines and shapes, this pack of 24 crayons offers a rainbow of hues for children to experiment with. Colored Pencils for Smooth Color Mixing and Blending This set includes a pack of 12 Crayola Colored Pencils featuring pre-sharpened thick, soft tips that won't break easily under pressure. The smooth colors are perfect for color mixing, blending, and more detailed techniques, as well as for coloring in small areas. These premium colored pencils are great for creating and coloring maps, art and science projects, as well as making signs and labels. Vibrant Broad Line Markers with Versatile Conical Tips Kids love colored markers because of how easily and brightly they can color in large areas. The included 10 Ultra-Clean Broad Line Washable Markers feature versatile conical tips that can be used for drawing lines and dots as well as quickly filling in large areas. These non-toxic washable markers also feature an improved Ultra-Clean formula that washes easily from skin, clothing, and other surfaces such as tables and painted walls. Fine Line Markers for Precise Coloring The Crayola Back to School 2017 Set Grades K-2 also includes Ultra-Clean Fine Line Washable Markers, giving kids the ability to add precise lines and color in detailed areas. Fine line markers are great for writing colorful notes, as well as shading, blending, and other coloring techniques that can create dramatic results. Crayons Colored Pencils Broad Line Markers Fine Line Markers
About Crayola: Art and Imagination Crayola art supplies and activities help children express, create, and connect through colorful play.
